{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "CampaignId": 2569
}
AbortPredictiveDialingCampaign.title: Stopping Predictive Outbound Call Task

Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAutoCalloutTask
<Common request parameters>
{
    "SdkAppId": 1400123455,
    "NotBefore": 1642500621,
    "Callees": [
        "008613012345678"
    ],
    "Callers": [
        "008602012345678"
    ],
    "IvrId": 8
}
CreateAutoCalloutTask.title: Creating Task

CreateCallOutSession.document: This example shows you how to trigger outbound calls through this API in the backend, without loading the front-end SDK. Currently, only outbound call back through the mobile end (first dialing the customer service mobile phone) is supported, and make sure that the addition of outbound call allowlist has been applied and passed.
CreateCallOutSession.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateCallOutSession
<Common request parameters>
{
    "IsForceUseMobile": "true",
    "Callee": "008612300000000",
    "UUI": "fooandbar",
    "UserId": "FooOrBar@tencent.com",
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000
}
CreateCallOutSession.title: Calling Outbound Call API

<Common Request Parameters>
{

"ExtensionName": "Extension 1"
}
CreateExtension.title: Creating Telephone Account

CreatePredictiveDialingCampaign.document: This example shows you how to create the predictive outbound call task.
CreatePredictiveDialingCampaign.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreatePredictiveDialingCampaign
<Common request parameters>
{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "Name": "New energy SUV recommendation",
    "Callees": [
        "+8613012345678",
        "+8613012345679",
        "+8613012345670"
    ],
    "Callers": [
        "0086075586013388"
    ],
    "CallOrder": 0,
    "SkillGroupId": 255,
    "IVRId": 4600,
    "Priority": 3,
    "ExpectedAbandonRate": 10,
    "RetryTimes": 1,
    "RetryInterval": 1800,
    "StartTime": 1708483433,
    "EndTime": 1708485433
}
CreatePredictiveDialingCampaign.title: Creating Predictive Outbound Call Task
